channel.title: New-Reality (New-Reality Remake) JOIN NOW
channel.description:
New-Reality was just released yesterday, we already have a growing playerbase!
MAX PLAYERS ONLINE SO FAR: 25
To start off, new-reality is based off near reality. Right now, new-reality is most similar to near-reality in about v11-v12. We are working hard each day, to make it look more and more like near reality at its prime of v13. We also offer a bit of that oldschool feeling in our current state of new-reality. We are an eco server, so you can pk, pvm, and a little bit of skilling for money.
Links ---------- Forum: New-Reality - Index Play Now/Download: Play now
From our hard work and dedication, we have so far achieved a lot. At the time of this thread being made, we have 140+ Members registered on the forums, and had 12 players online within the first out of release. We will constantly be adding new content, and take in many suggestions from the players. We will be working a ton, with massive updates along with new client releases.
The ultimate goal for new-reality, is to basically bring back the experience of nrpk.New-Reality has an outstanding community, and the ultimate experience. We have dedicated staff (looking for more) and a dedicated development team. We will provide new content with daily updates, while taking suggestions from the community to add new features into the game. We ensure you that you will have an enjoyable time here, and you will make many new friends and have a lot of fun.
Through out the future, there will be many fun community events hosted such as: pk tournaments, hide and seeks, hp events ect... Our goal is to make our community grow, and become a successful game. By doing this we will encourage our players to use our auto vote system, and we will keep advertising our server.
Development of the server:
The development team here at new-reality is very dedicated. We ensure you that we will constantly update the server with new content. We will be running polls every so often on our forums to determine what new content the community wants. New-Reality definitely is now at its greatest right now, throughout time we will work hard and try to make it at its greatest. Lately we have put so much time into the server, due to some issues. But the outcome from all this hard work brings you NEW-REALITY V2

item.title: New-Reality (New-Reality Remake) JOIN NOW
item.dc:creator: @Flame3 John
item.description:
@Flame3 wrote:

If functional links that lead to a playable client are not posted in one hour, this advertisement will be closed.
Thanks, and good luck with your server.

Read full topic
